job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Government Relations,Architecture & Planning
job.description: <p><strong>Job Title: Machine Learning Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Duration: 12+ Months Contract with possible extension </strong></p><p><strong>Location: 100% remote &lt;Work from home role&gt;</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>NOT OPEN FOR JUNIOR OR ENTRY LEVEL - MORE THAN 8 YEAR'S OF EXPERICNE REQUIRED </strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Key Skills:</strong></p><ul><li>Development of predictive models and analytics</li><li>Data cleansing and shaping</li><li>Break/fix support and retraining of models</li><li>Advisory during ongoing design efforts of future rollouts</li><li>Skillset – Python, Jupyter Notebook, XGBoost, SKLearn</li><li>Would consider contract-to-hire; supporting one particular project, but able to expand role into other client initiatives</li><li>US-based; Houston local a plus</li><li>Remote work is acceptable</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong><em>Note: If interested please email me your resume at anil.chamoli@mastechdigital.com or call me at 973-922-1844.</em></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Best Regards,</strong></p><p><strong>Anil Chamoli</strong></p><p>Lead Recruiter</p><p>973-922-1844</p><p>Anil.Chamoli@mastechdigital.com</p><p>www.mastechdigital.com</p>
